title: HAR Export Trigger
name: harexporttrigger
description: Trigger HAR export any time directly from within a page
author: Firebug Working Group

preferences.name: contentAPIToken
preferences.title: Content API Token
preferences.description: Set to true to expose HAR trigger API into the content

preferences.name: enableAutomation
preferences.title: Enable automatic collecting of HAR data
preferences.description: Flip this option to enable automatic collecting of HAR data, so HAR export can be triggered when necessary
